info.description:
I'll give 1-2k for a decent chapter.



Your entire life has been filled with fat women who never seem to take a shower. At the same time, it's almost as if you're invisible to them as the only way you can get noticed is if you're literally in their face screaming.

Over the years you started to like being sat on and smelling these fat women. This interactive starts you off on the day you decide to take advantage of your "luck".

RULES

1: Any perspective is fine to write in. Me, personally write in the second person.
2: Women either shouldn't notice you or they're listening to a request from you.
3: In addition to #2, women aren't malicious and out to get you, so don't make it like that.
4: You like being sat on and like the bad smells, don't make this a story where you get tortured.
5: Don't do 1 line chapters unless it's a choice chapter and even then, try to stretch it out a bit.
6: ONLY WOMEN.
7: Any age is allowed, you can do stuff with teenagers, fat 5 year olds, or even 70 year olds if you're into that.
